definition: down/downwards/below/lower/later/next (week etc)/second (of two parts)/to decline/to go down/to arrive at (a decision, conclusion etc)/measure word to show the frequency of an action

sentences.english: Drew dripped the drink from the dipper, but he did not drink the drops.
sentences.chinese: 德鲁让大勺子里的饮料滴下来，却没有喝。

sentences.english: The lights went out, the music rest, can not drop tears has stopped.
sentences.chinese: 灯光熄灭了，音乐静止了，滴下的眼泪已停不住。

sentences.english: The container was filled with water that dripped through the hole.
sentences.chinese: 容器底有个小孔容器内装满水，水通过孔滴下。

sentences.english: Water is dripping from that leaky faucet.
sentences.chinese: 水正从漏水的笼头滴下来。

sentences.english: The suspense grew, along with the beads of sweat forming on our foreheads.
sentences.chinese: 随着脑门上的汗水不断滴下，我们的疑虑也在增加。

sentences.english: Water is dripping from the roof.
Water is dripping steadily from the crystalline rock.
sentences.chinese: 水从岩洞上有节奏的滴下来。

sentences.english: Icicles are formed when water dripping from an object freezes, forming long, tapered spikes.
sentences.chinese: 冰柱是由从物体上滴下来，冻结成长锥状的水形成的。

sentences.english: Sweat was dripping from his face.
By his knowledge the depths are broken up, and the clouds drop down the dew.
sentences.chinese: 以知识使深渊裂开，使天空滴下甘露。

sentences.english: Water was dripping from the trees, and the grass was wet.
sentences.chinese: 水从树上滴下来，草很湿。

sentences.english: He distills a little urine after he has accomplished urinating.
sentences.chinese: 他小便后，还会有少量零碎地滴下。

sentences.english: The formation and excretion of sweat.
Simply push on the right nostril and your green gel will ooze right out.
sentences.chinese: 轻轻按一下右边的鼻孔，绿色的皂液马上就会滴下来。

definition: to let drip/to trickle down/to shed (tears)
to moisten/to dampen/to be steeped in/to be imbued with
